sentence: Among those endorsed by Mr. Trump is Loren Culp, a former police chief of a one-officer department in rural Washington State who lost the 2020 governor's race by more than 540,000 votes, yet claimed fraud when Gov.
title: How the G.O.P.'s Censure Fight Exposes the Party's Deeper Divide

sentence: In Washington state, Thiel gave a much smaller amount ($2,900) to gubernatorial hopeful Loren Culp; his campaign also spiraled.
author: Abram Brown
title: Poolside Fundraisers, Crypto And Mini-Trumps: Inside Peter Thiel's Life After Facebook
